SqlOutput.Sql: CASE WHEN $!s0s!$.customtext__c COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2 LIKE REPLACE($!s0s!$.customexpr__c,'[','\[') ESCAPE '\' THEN 'TRUE' ELSE 'FALSE' END
